page.title: 07Cockerham Sports Day
page.content: Cockerham Sports Day is an annual event which takes place on the first Saturday in July regardless of the weather.It is a very joyous event which involves most of the village community.Aparade sets off after lunch down the street ,which is decorated with flags and bunting.A pipe band leads the way,followed by the Sports Queen,her page boy and her attendants. They are the stars of the day.The rest of the children follow the Queen dressed in costumes according to the chosen theme.After the Sports Queen is crowned and everyone has been welcomed ,the children's races begin and the sideshows open.Some boys and girls take part in maypole dancing.The adults are not forgotten on this very important village day.Sports and games are organised at night for them, followed by a friendly Family Dance.
